type: TS LF Trading Bot Warning - Simulating - Slippage Substracted

definition.text: Slippage Amount was calculated based on the Session Configuration and substracted from the Order Rate in order to have the Actual Rate. It was subsctracted because what we had was a Market Sell Order.

paragraphs.text: This is normal behaviour you should not worry about. This warning is created in order to let you know that this happened and help you track the details of each trade.
Check below how the Actual Rate is treated during a Simulation.
Superalgos->Topic->Simulating Sync With the Exchange->Actual Rate Simulation
The following are the values of variables at the time this warning was created. They might be useful for you to understand what exactly happened.
